hero.title: Your AI Companion,
hero.description: Compass is an open-source AI chat application that gives you control of privacy and speed. Run entirely offline when privacy is a priority or connect to one of many providers, such as ChatGPT, when you need the latest models.

providers.title: Choose between
providers.subtitle: many AI providers
providers.description: Avoid getting trapped in a single eco-system - switch between providers with your chat history and documents intact

compass.title: Compass
compass.description: Compass exists within your own local network, however it can also connect to the internet to access the latest models from providers like ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini.

polaris.title: Polaris
polaris.description: Polaris acts as a middleman, allowing you to setup your documents, characters and providers in one place and share it amongst multiple compass users.

features.title: Why Choose
features.subtitle: Compass
features.description: Built with core values of sovereignty, privacy, and control

privacy.title: Complete Privacy
privacy.description: Run models locally on your device. No data ever needs to be sent to external servers without your explicit permission.

bestOfBoth.title: Best of Both Worlds
bestOfBoth.description: Connect to providers like ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini for cutting-edge models, or stay offline for sensitive tasks.

ownership.title: True Ownership
ownership.description: You own your data and conversations. Export, delete, or manage them however you want.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Fully transparent codebase. Verify the security and privacy claims yourself.

offline.title: Offline Capable
offline.description: Works without an internet connection. Perfect for travel or when privacy is a priority.

customizable.title: Customizable
customizable.description: Adapt Compass to your specific needs with plugins and extensions.

contact.title: Get In
contact.subtitle: Touch
contact.description: Interested in Compass? Reach out through any of these channels.
